title: As soon as the approval (Letter of Intent) is given to the Project, the NOC for building permission of the landowning authority shall be given in respect of that lands belonging to any department, undertaking, agency of the State Govt including MHADA, or any local self – Govt such as the MCGM within 60 days after the intimation of such approval to the Project is communicated
clause_text: As soon as the approval (Letter of Intent) is given to the Project, the NOC for building permission of the landowning authority shall be given in respect of that lands belonging to any department, undertaking, agency of the State Govt including MHADA, or any local self – Govt such as the MCGM within 60 days after the intimation of such approval to the Project is communicated. In the event of its refusal to grant NOC, reasons thereof shall be stated and in the eventof its not been given within the period, it shall be deemed to have been given.
section: Building Permission under Dharavi Redevelopment Project:
